description: I set the mosaics on 1/8” backer board and allowed that to cure overnight. The next day I back notch troweled the mosaic/board and set it inside the niche. Definitely a great option for tricky tiles. This full tile shower video series can be seen inside our Video Library at homerepairtutor.com 👍🏽🔥#tile #tileshower #bathroomremodel #homerenovation
title: How to Add Marble Mosaics Inside a Shower Niche - #shorts #homerepairtutor
